name: Untitled (Red, Magenta and Orange X 2)
description:
Part of a collection of home made color field items, this Untitled piece is about the quest for independent reproducibility.

The lights from two glowing panes create liminal gateways where viewers can step in and subjectively experience basic humans emotions. Now ecstasy and euphoria, now tragedy and doom.

The world is about to change.

Crypto economics won't be about assumptions. It will be about independent reproducible experiments.
Crypto journalism won't be about opinions. It will be about independent reproducible facts.
Crypto science won't be about theories. It will be about independent reproducible evidence.

Nonetheless, crypto art won't be about reproducible emotions.
